若 $g(x) = \frac{1}{2}x^2 + 2x + 2 + t \sin x$. 若 $\exists x \in [\frac{\pi}{6}, \frac{\pi}{2}]$, $f(x+1) + g(x) \ge 0$ 成立, 求整数 $t$ 的最小值.

(参考数据: $\ln(\frac{\pi}{6}+1) \approx 0.4211, \ln(\frac{\pi}{4}+1) \approx 0.5796, \ln(\frac{\pi}{2}+1) \approx 0.9442, (\frac{\pi}{4})^2 \approx 0.6169, (\frac{\pi}{6})^2 \approx 0.2742, (\frac{\pi}{2})^2 \approx 2.4674$)
